title: The book titled “Prabakarange Elam Sihinaya Sunu Vinusu Kala Ranaviruwo” presented to Secretary Defence
content: Adding another historical chapter to the military literature, a book titled “Prabakarange Elam Sihinaya Sunu Vinusu Kala Ranaviruwo” was officially presented to the Secretary Defence yesterday (29 May) at his office….
